name: Marketing Ignite
tag_list: seo, ppc, video-production, video, video-editing, editing, translation, online-marketing, internet-marketing, marketing, branding, strategies
overview:
Marketing Ignite provides a comprehensive collection of online marketing strategies.

It does:

Extensive SEO and PPC campaigns.

Quality link-building.

Manual submissions into online directories.

Online Video Marketing: Production and Editing.

Video Promotion

Video Optimization.

Website Translation into 12 Languages.

It focuses on providing Asian Prices with Western Quality, as it is managed by Swedish and Canadians in Asia.

11 years of experience.

Works with medium to large companies, including Shangri-la Hotels, Mercedes Benz, and Colliers International.
